content:
# The attempt to craft stone bricks has failed because it requires a specific crafting or smelting machine, such as a stone furnace, to process the raw stone into bricks.
# This means I need to first craft at least one stone furnace before I can create stone bricks.

# Since I have enough resources to craft two stone furnaces, I will try crafting them again, ensuring I have enough stone in my inventory.

# Attempting to craft 2 stone furnaces again.
craft_item(stone_furnace_prototype, quantity=2)
print(f"Crafted 2 stone furnaces.")
